item.title: কম খরচে A1 জার্মান কোর্স কোথায় করা যায়? 🇦🇹
item.description: কম খরচে A1 জার্মান কোর্স কোথায় করা যায়? INNES Vienna, VHS, এবং অন্যান্য বিকল্প সম্পর্কে বিস্তারিত জানুন।

item.title: Visa Renewal Process in Vienna 🇦🇹
item.description: A step-by-step guide for Bangladeshi students in Vienna to renew their student visa, including required documents, fees, and appointment booking details.

item.title: Things to Do After Landing in Vienna as a Student 🇦🇹
item.description: A step-by-step guide for international students arriving in Vienna, covering essential registrations, accommodation, bank accounts, and other necessary tasks.

item.title: How to Get Permission from AMS to Work as a Student in Austria
item.description: A complete guide for students in Austria on how to get work permission from AMS, including the required form and AMS office location for submission.

item.title: Best SIM Cards for Students in Vienna 📱🇦🇹
item.description: A guide to the best SIM card options for students in Vienna, including budget-friendly packages and student-exclusive offers like Educom.

item.title: How to Get Austrian Health Insurance as a Student (ÖGK Student Insurance Guide) 🏥🇦🇹
item.description: A step-by-step guide on how international students can get Austrian public health insurance (ÖGK), including requirements, costs, and how to apply.

item.title: Best Banks for Students in Vienna 🏦🇦🇹
item.description: A detailed guide on the best student-friendly banks in Vienna, including free accounts for students under 27, digital banking options, and commission-free accounts for students earning over €600.

item.title: House Contract in Austria – Wohnrechtsvereinbarung 🏠🇦🇹
item.description: A guide to understanding the Wohnrechtsvereinbarung (Right of Residence Agreement) in Austria, including its importance for visa renewal, university registration, and financial purposes.

item.title: How to Get a Meldezettel (Address Registration) in Austria 🏠🇦🇹
item.description: A complete guide on how students and residents can register their address in Austria (Meldezettel), including required documents, office locations, and common issues.

item.title: How to Get the Klimabonus in Austria 🌱💰
item.description: A step-by-step guide for students and residents on claiming the Klimabonus in Austria, including eligibility, common issues, and how to link your bank account through FinanzOnline.

item.title: How to Visit a Doctor in Austria as an International Student 🏥🇦🇹
item.description: A step-by-step guide on how international students can visit a doctor in Austria, including insurance options, finding English-speaking doctors, and emergency healthcare services.

item.title: How to Create a FinanzOnline Account in Austria 💰🇦🇹
item.description: A step-by-step guide for students on how to create a FinanzOnline account in Austria to manage taxes, income declarations, and financial services.
